title: Did not know the transaction was Riba, what to do? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Hasleen from India Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Nowhere in Islam it tells us that, no, no, no, you give the 10,000 as well, as a form of repentance. There is no need for that at all.
